# AGENCY BUILDLAB Website

This project is a modern website for AGENCY BUILDLAB built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Structure
- Next.js 15 framework for React-based development
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Modern agency components (hero, services, portfolio, contact)

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow Next.js best practices for routing and SEO
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Optimize images and performance

## Components Included
- ✅ Hero section with agency branding
- ✅ Services showcase
- ✅ Portfolio/work examples
- ✅ Contact form
- ✅ Navigation and footer

## Status: ✅ Project completed and running

The development server is running at http://localhost:3000
